Package src

Class TriState

java.lang.Object
src.Student
src.NonResident
src.TriState
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Student>
public class TriState
extends NonResident
This class extends NonResident. Contains methods for checking what tuition should be due for the Student depending on credits enrolled and the toString() method.
Author:
Christian Osma, Liam Smith

    • TriState

      public TriState​(java.lang.String state, Profile profile, Major major, int creditsCompleted)
      Overloaded constructor that instantiates a new TriState object by calling the NonResident constructor and taking 4 parameters to do so
      Parameters:
      state - The String representation of the state to use as an instance variable for the object
      profile - The Profile object to use as an instance variable for the object
      major - The Major enum to use as an instance variable for the object
      creditsCompleted - the number of credits completed as an integer to use as an instance variable for the object
